backend/main.mo: Backend actor defining user, brand, creator, collaboration, and payment types with Stripe integration, authorization, and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing theme updates, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS defining pastel OKLCH design tokens for light/dark themes and applying base Tailwind resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the app root and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and wrapping the app in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with wordmark, navigation links, contact info, and social media icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the site header with navigation, login/logout handling, and mobile menu logic tied to Internet Identity and user roles.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps pages with a header, footer, and main content area using a flex column layout.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HowItW: Displays a list of numbered marketing steps with titles and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Market: Provides a simple wrapper container for marketing pages.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Social: Shows a threeâ€‘column statistics strip with icons for creators, campaigns, and brands.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context using Internet Identity, providing identity state, login, and logout logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user, brand, and creator profiles through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind styles, theme variables, dark mode tokens, and marketing component classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/BrandDashboardPage.ts: Brand dashboard showing campaign stats, creator search with filters, and sending collaboration requests with payment flow.
Creator dashboard displaying profile and stats, with functionality to edit profile details and upload a profile picture.
frontend/src/pages/ForBrandsPage.tsx: Marketing page explaining features and workflow for brands, with CTAs to sign up or view a demo.
frontend/src/pages/ForCreatorsPage.tsx: Marketing page outlining benefits and steps for creators, including CTAs to join the platform or learn more.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page highlighting platform value, how it works, and navigation prompts for signup or brand information.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity, redirecting users based on role and providing a button to initiate login.
frontend/src/pages/SignUpPage.tsx: Provides brand and creator signup forms with Internet Identity auth, profile picture upload, and mutation calls to register accounts.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Utility functions for formatting numbers and bigints as USD currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters via query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, and layout settings with plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Describes the project's architecture, features, and known issues for the IC-based influencer marketing platform.
